subject: Order #SSN4272
description_text:
Hi I am checking on the status of my order, I placed the order at the
beginning of December and selected local delivery (no tax) but according to
the tracking it shipped from China, and seems to be delayed in customs.
Tracking has been stuck at "Flight landed in New York" for several days
now.

SF Express SF6047114667406
<https://www.sf-express.com/we/ow/chn/en/waybill/waybill-detail/SF6047114667406>

conversations.body_text: Hi I haven't heard anything back. Â I do not want to have to do a charge back with my credit card but I'm lost on what else to do at this point in time.

Hi James,    I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. Here is your shipping tracking link. Your package is expected to arrive within the next couple of days.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=TEP00107010100
